org.jcatapult.security.servlet.auth
Class DefaultAuthorizationExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.security.servlet.auth.DefaultAuthorizationExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthorizationExceptionHandler
public class DefaultAuthorizationExceptionHandler
extends Object
implements AuthorizationExceptionHandler

This class handles authorization exceptions that are thrown by the implementation of the Authorizer that are caught by the DefaultAuthorizationWorkflow. This class handles the exception by creating a request that is handled by Struts action. The URI for the action that is invoked by Struts is controlled by the configuration parameter named jcatapult.security.authorization.restricted-uri. The default URI is /not-authorized.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli
